channel.title: How do I make it so a client isn't required?
channel.description: Okay so I'm using my own client, I even tried moparscape client and I can't login to my server. What coding do I delete so that there is no client required and any user can login with any client?

item.title: How do I make it so a client isn't required?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You would have to remove any customized content from the server, which can be very difficult if you don’t know what to remove.

Look at the error message that the MoparScape client gives you and go from there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so a client isn't required?

item.title: How do I make it so a client isn't required?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

look in “server” java, with the circle on it, or even the other not sure.

And it should say something like… playerworld = 3, change to 0. Idk for sure, so don’t accuse me of nothing >.<

Read full topic
